Description:
Detects Obfuscated use of Environment Variables to execute PowerShell

Author: Jonathan Cheong, oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Invoke-Obfuscation VAR+ Launcher - PowerShell
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where scriptblocktext re 'cmd.{0,5}(?:/c|/r)(?:\s|)"set\s[a-zA-Z]{3,6}.*(?:\{\d\}){1,}\\"\s+?-f(?:.*\)){1,}.*"'
